title: A resolution relating to the death of Antonin Scalia, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States.
short_title: A resolution relating to the death of Antonin Scalia, Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States.
latest_major_action: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 0. Record Vote Number: 26. (text: CR 2/24/2016 S1003)
summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Acknowledges the lifetime of service of Antonin Scalia, Associate Justice of the U.S. Supreme Court. Commends his 29-year tenure on the Court and extends sympathy to his family and friends on his death. .
summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Acknowledges the lifetime of service of Antonin Scalia, Associate Justice of the U.S. Supreme Court. Commends his 29-year tenure on the Court and extends sympathy to his family and friends on his death. .

actions.description: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 0. Record Vote Number: 26. (text: CR 2/24/2016 S1003)
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent. (consideration: CR S1036)
Submitted in the Senate and ordered held at desk.
